text: is a Japanese footballer who plays as a right back for Blaublitz Akita. ==Career== Suzuki signed for Fujieda MYFC on 10 December 2018.鈴木準弥選手 新加入のお知らせ, myfc.co.jp, 10 December 2018 ==Club statistics== Updated to 1 January 2020.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2019 (NSK MOOK)", 9 February 2019, Japan, (p. 269 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
